title: Naturi Naughton And Omari Hardwick: Power Puzzlers
description: Naturi Naughton and Omari Hardwick reveal what inspires their characters on Starz's Power, then sing the titles to classic 90s R&B hits. Plus, a Mystery Guest has hired some unusual summer workers.
